text:
[Verse]
Feet on the pavement
Love in the air
Feeling the raindrops
Dancing without care

[Verse 2]
Rhythm in my heartbeat
Smiles everywhere
Oh the world's a playground
Join me if you dare

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
No worries no pain
Spinning round and round again
Oh we are dancing in the rain

[Bridge]
Thunder in the distance
But we don't mind
Lightning lights our dance floor
Let your heart unwind

[Verse 3]
Laughing in the moonlight
Stars shining bright
Every step together
Feels so right tonight

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
No worries no pain
Spinning round and round again
Oh we are dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
